title: AI-Powered Quantum Circuit Optimization Toolkit
description: Unlock the potential of quantum computing with this innovative toolkit that leverages large language models (LLMs) for optimizing quantum circuits ðŸ¤–ðŸ”¬. Designed for researchers and developers, it enables seamless generation of random quantum circuits using Cirq, complete with configurable parameters, noise simulation, and dataset creation for robust training and testing. Harness AI providers like OpenRouter and Google Gemini through in-context learning to intelligently reduce circuit complexity and enhance efficiency, all via a user-friendly unified CLI. The extensible architecture allows easy integration of new providers and circuit types, fostering experimentation in quantum algorithm design. From quick setups with virtual environments to advanced optimizations with custom examples and timeouts, this project streamlines the bridge between classical AI and quantum hardware. Explore future enhancements like reinforcement learning and batch processing to push the boundaries of error mitigation and performance in noisy quantum environments. (142 words)
